QuestData.Title: Commander in the Field!
QuestData.Description: We have been stopped by these new fel orcs, but we will ultimately prevail. Draka and I did manage to get a full scouting group out into the jungle to gather what else we will have to deal with.$b$bYou should seek them out, gain a full understanding of what we face here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get reports from various scouts in Tanaan Jungle.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with the scout in southwest Tanaan Jungle
Speak with the scout in northwest Tanaan Jungle
Speak with the scout in northeast Tanaan Jungle
